headline.main: CHENNAULT PRAISES FLIERS; Stresses Records of A.V.G. and Our Task Force in China

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Oct. 2 -- In a special broadcast to America this morning Brig. Gen. Claire L. Chennault, head of the China Air Task Force, said:
abstract: Chennault lauds AVG fliers, radio s
